org.ejml.alg.dense.decomposition
Class DecompositionFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.ejml.alg.dense.decomposition.DecompositionFactory

public class DecompositionFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Selecting which specific implementation of a decomposition to use can be difficult unless one has an intiment understanding of each of them works. This class provides static functions that can be used to create a new instance of a decomposition that should work well for almost all matrices and is reasonably fast.

Author:
Peter Abeles

Method Detail

chol

public static CholeskyDecomposition chol(int widthMax,
                                         boolean decomposeOrig,
                                         boolean lower)

If you don't know which Cholesky algorithm to use, call this function to select what is most likely the best one for you.

Creates a new instance of a CholeskyDecomposition algorithm. It selects the best algorithm depening on the size of the largest matrix it might decompose.

Parameters:
widthMax - The maximum width of a matrix that can be processed.
decomposeOrig - Should it decompose the matrix that is passed in or declare a new one?
lower - should a lower or upper triangular matrix be used.
Returns:
A new CholeskyDecomposition.
